ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
PrecisRegulations Amending the PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS REGULATIONS, 1985 by eliminating the requirement that a Life Income Fund (LIF) contract provide for the conversion of the funds into an annuity when the holder reaches 80 years of age.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0208 Publication Date: 2006-10-04
